dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: 2011 Soil moisture and temperature
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Soil moisture and temperature for wet meadow grassland sampling points in 2011. Cumulative soil moisture adds together data from sampling events 3 and 4. Data was collected in the field.
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: grasslands
cattle

habitat management
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:spatial: Red Rock Lakes National Wildlife Refuge
